newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Oracle EPS view raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Oracle EPS view raised.

text.p: Gruntal & Co said it raised its fiscal 1998 earnings estimate on Oracle Corp to $1.44 a share from $1.36 a share.
-- Gruntal said maintained a hold rating on the stock.
-- On Tuesday, Oracle posted fourth quarter earnings of $0.54 a share, up from $0.40 a share a year ago.
-- Gruntal said Oracle's fourth quarter revenues of $1.95 billion were slightly below its expectations, but said expense controls were better than forecasts.

-- Gruntal said Oracle acknowledged the slowing of growth in databases during the analyst conference call. Oracle "did not offer a clear view" on why database growth appears to be slowing industrywide.
-- Gruntal said applications, however, remain strong and now comprise about 20 percent of the company's sales.
